/users: GET request to get all users
/users/:userId: get, update and delete specific user with id using GET,PUT and DELETE request
/posts: to get all posts using GET request
/post/new/:userId: to create a new post using POST request
/post/by/:userId: to get all the posts of a specific user using GET request
/post/:postId: update a post with PUT request and delete a post with DELETE request
